entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: AssemblyLoadContext.MixedAssemblyLoadContextFactory #62754
  • [Feature Request] cross-platform data protection #62748
  • Constructing MD arrays in R2R code does not work on OSX/ARM64 #62747
  • [test] Rename build.sh 'excludemonofailures' option to 'mono' #62745
  • [Test] Test build does not give useful error if clr.hosts is not built #62744
  • getVarReg(predVarToRegMap, varIndex) == targetReg || getLsraBlockBoundaryLocations() == LSRA_BLOCK_BOUNDARY_ROTATE' during 'LSRA allocate' #62742
  • Executables in TRUSTED_PLATFORM_ASSEMBLIES prevents finding any subsequent dlls #62735
  • [System.Text.Json] Why is it calling my constructors and not simply instantiating memory? #62734
  • ILVerify fails with error [MissingMethod] if call to method uses a parameter with type from an embedded interop assembly #62732
  • Plan to include Regex based Replace option in StringBuilder #62730
  • [tests][Android] Executing assembly location mismatch /data/data/ and /data/user/ #62729
    7.0.0
  • [Windows x86 Release] DllImportGenerator.Tests crashes the runtime in InvokeManagedCallbackAfterGCCollect #62728
  • dotnet 6 - Segfault -- Runtime compilation [crossgen2] #62727
  • RegexNode.ComputeMinLength should do better for some Testref/Testgroup nodes #62723
    7.0.0
  • JsonElement.TryGetDateTime throws IndexOutOfRangeException #62720
    7.0.0
  • Regex source generator should include capture group name in comment #62715
    7.0.0
  • Matrix3x2.Invert doesn't actually have tolerance #62714
  • [Android][x86] System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException : The X509 certificate store is read-only. #62713
  • ILVerify.ILVerifyTypeSystemContext.VerifyModuleName throws NullReferenceException if missing DLL #62711
  • [wasm] Allow user to set `-s ENVIRONMENT` setting #62708
    7.0.0
  • Discussion: A way to prevent `Process` from configuring the terminal #62707
  • Handling certain special signals properly is impossible with `PosixSignalRegistration` #62706
  • exception catch clause does work on Linux arm/arm64 for .net 6.0 release #62702
  • HTTP/2: Response header parsing performance opportunities #62701
  • DllImportGenerator should error if attribute is applied to an extern #62700
  • sslStream.AuthenticateAsServer does not send the root certificate during TLS handshake #62699
  • Investigate benefit of computing max regex match length #62697
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator.cmd #62696
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\eh\\leaves\\oponerror_ro\\oponerror_ro.cmd #62695

Closed

  • Developers can precompile their Regex code for faster startup #44676
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbJumpKind == BBJ_NONE || block->bbJumpKind == BBJ_ALWAYS' #62005
    7.0.0
  • Is linear get/set access to elements of an array of arbitrary rank, possible? #62733
  • Explicit struct size is not always taken into account in code emitted at runtime #62597
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.LogWritten #62616
  • JsonReaderException during JSON deserialization #62427
  • JIT assert on arm64 when running DllImportGenerator tests: op2->TypeIs(TYP_LONG) #60624
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/Boxing/xlang tests #62753
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Rename IHttpHeadersHandler to IHttpStreamHeadersHandler #62750
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Rename 'excludemonofailures' to 'mono' #62749
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests] Re-enable some explicit layout tests on Mono #62746
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Do not create non-null assertions from location nodes #62743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Do not promote struct locals with holes #62738
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add more precise descriptor for RuntimeAssembly #62737
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Fix SendPacketsAsync failures on macos #62726
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62725
  • Unify native file name props #62724
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62716
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Fix imports: require, exit, quit #62712
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][release/6.0] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62705
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • Add support for NativeAOT testing #62704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Do not perform vector save/restore around call that will never return #62662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify naming style of dbg / rel-variant JIT projects #62710
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix SC tests #62698
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Clear list of OOB packages built on 6.0 #62610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Disable X509StoreTests.RemoveReadOnlyNonExistingDoesNotThrow test #62717
    area-System.Security
  • Do not promote struct locals with holes #62645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable building StressLogAnalyzer for Alpine #62703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Do not contain zeroes for `STOREIND(CLS_VAR_ADDR)` #62686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix invalid IR in span indexer import #62709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62428
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve ARM64 JIT disassembly #62557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62601
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1510845 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Attempt to repro named mutex pal test issue #62655
    * NO MERGE *, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Make mono runtime tests stop using patching in CI; remove dependency on coreclr #62652
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP]: Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use workloads to run AOT tests #61863
    arch-wasm
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add custom marshaller tests for delegates #62691
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Project items added via VS API are writing resulting formatted doc in wrong place #58311
  • Refactoring ignores inactive #if #58309
  • Parameter null-checking public API #58307
  • InvalidOperationException from FindReferencesProgressAdapter.OnReferenceFoundAsync #58305
  • Local functions don't give unreachability diagnostics #58304
  • CS1525 raised on unexpected location #58298
  • Null-state static analysis fails when the value is assigned to a variable #58297

Closed

  • Refactoring ignores inactive #if #58310
  • Non-nullable value detected as nullable #58211
  • IOperation support for implicit Index/Range indexer over non-array types #58079
    17.1
  • Unexpected nullable warning in local function by changing declared type of captured local #40821
  • Developers get guidance on best practices when writing C# or VB code #58289
  • Move away from binary trees in regex parser #58186
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the status of required members. #58308
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable PR trigger for DartLab integration tests. #58303
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58306
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #58183
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Add VSTypeScriptBlockStructure external access APIs #58252
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58302
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update PerfView instructions to omit .NETTasks:0:0 #58301
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix stack exhaustion when parsing large regex alternating sequences. #58254
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58293
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [LSP] Add semantic token caching for solution open #58238
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE
  • Check operations when doing type name simplification #58285
    Area-IDE
  • Added additional test from duplicate VS feedback item. #57860
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing issue with output files with the same relative path #39012
  • Debugging Blazor WASM project running from a directory with special characters fails to #39011
  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39010
  • Compiling Razor netcoreapp3.1 project does not respect <Content Remove="..." /> items #39009
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39001
  • Blazor dotnet publish error Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly.ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.GroupExistingStaticWebAssets #39000
  • Quarantine PersistentState_StreamsReused_StatePersisted #38998
    Test failures
  • Quarantine ShutdownTimeoutIsApplied #38995
    Test failures
  • Access to the IDatabase field in RedisCache #38993
  • Support overriding Authority configuration on login #38986
    Backlog
  • Remove obsolete types from code and code parts that uses types not available in higher versions. #38985
  • Blazor Performance Diagnostics for Re-Rendering and Execution times. #38984
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: mapaction #38983

Closed

  • Separate IHttpHeadersHandler public API from internal one #38981
    7.0-preview1
  • Process Handler Load Failure #38746
  • IDistributedCache - return "RedisServerException: WRONGTYPE Operation against a key holding the wrong kind of value" #38904
  • blazor wasm first load after release cause the error . TypeError: NetworkError when attempting to fetch resource. #38961
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #38964
  • Perf regression: json #38949
  • NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #38945
  • [.Net 5 MVC with Blazor] Creating new razor components not working #38950
  • Environment Variables on Blazor Webasm issues #38987
  • FileUpload: Did not receive any data in the allotted time. #38842
  • Unable to configure OpenIdConnectOptions for authenitcation #38992
  • Some strings break TempData #38989
  • [.NET6] Referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation breaks hot reload for .cshtml files #38965
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, single_query #38963
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38968
  • The problem of re-initializing components during routing. #38966
  • The global exception handler is rethrowing the BadHttpRequestException: Unexpected end of request content as unhandled exception #26276
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Use JSON Property Name attributes when creating ModelState Validation errors #39008
    area-mvc
  • [release/3.1] Remove Helix remnants #39004
    tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [WIP] ANCM on ARM64 #38997
  • Simplify some build infrastructure #38980

Merged

  • Upgrade SDK #39006
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • !nits! Build cleanup #38979
    7.0-preview1
  • Use CDN for .NET Assets #39007
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Split IHttpHeadersHandler into internal and pubinternal copies #38982
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump up download file timeout #39005
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add logging to PersistentState_StreamsReused_StatePersisted #39003
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine PersistentState_StreamsReused_StatePersisted #38999
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ShutdownTimeoutIsApplied #38996
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Turn off parallelization for ShadowCopy tests #38956
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d61d4d8` to `054a986` #38988
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove a superfluous cache in `RouteValueDictionary`. #38660
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add EmptyContent to Virtualize #38978
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38927
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Prevent SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38901
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Revert .NET SDK test bump, again #38937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Empty view is shown in DatePicker instead of dates in Android platform. #3749
  • Picker , DatePicker and TimePicker popup did not open in MacCatalyst #3748
  • Dependency Injection - Converter Parse Exception on MainPage #3747
  • DynamicResource not working for inner views #3745
  • dotnet/dotnet exited with code 1 #3744
  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android #3743
  • Use HttpClient in Maui #3742

Closed

  • [Bug] Hot reload on Blazor: StateHasChanged may not being executed #2503

PullRequests

Created

  • Try with a delay #3752
  • Merge 6.0.100-preview11 to main #3750
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Remove some pending TODOs #3746
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Hide maui templates in VS 17.0 and lower #3734
    area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3740
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Window flyout handler #3735
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮
  • Essentials fix DeviceDisplay and DeviceInfo #3738
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Added Shell Page dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709
    area/layout 🔲
  • Added support for hosted services #2244 #3724
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement Eval method in WebViewHandler #3331
    area/controls 🎮
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Updated SearchBarHandler native events #3728
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet ef migrations add does not recognize data annotation Key #26992
  • Reverse Engineer - Virtual property and collection named badly when field name ends in GUID #26990
  • If error occurred while saving changes, StateChanged event will not be triggered. #26989
  • sqlite + ef core #26991
  • Owned entity with compound key #26984
  • Adding Base Type navigation properties leads to many-to-many relationship validation #26982
  • [Cosmos] How and where discriminator functionality is implemented? #26980
  • Invalid operation exception while connecting database #26979
  • Issue with HasPartitionKey when specify nested property #26978
  • ChangeTracker and the results of deserializing data of tree-like structures #26977

Closed

  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold doesn't work with computed columns unless user is db_owner #22842
    7.0.0
  • Announcing the Plan for EF Core 6.0 (Updated) #23870
    Discussions
  • In memory provider does not throw when navigation property is null #26987
  • Post-migration event #26976

PullRequests

Created

  • Distinguish cancellation from failure #26988

Merged

  • Log warning when credentials used for reverse enigineering does not have view definition rights #26776
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Replace our nullability decoding with the new BCL API #26967
  • Static analysis: revert tail recursion unrolling #26970
  • No test left behind: Ef6GroupByTest #26974
  • [6.0.2] Add the ability to break self-ref cycles between added and removed entities #26963
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.2] Call sync connection close instead of async #26943
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Static analysis: inconsistent naming and namespaces #26919

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • After .NET 7.0 SDK is installed, there is no .NET 7.0 template gets installed, I can't create .NET 7.0 project. #12806

Updated

  • .NET 6 installer fails builds of Azure Function projects on macOS #11951

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean prebuilt baseline #12816
  • Update build logic to handle checked in project.assets.json in NuGet repo #12810

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
